de.feu.propra15.q9278273.algorithm

Class DoubleLinkedList

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.feu.propra15.q9278273.algorithm.DoubleLinkedList

  • public class DoubleLinkedList
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DoubleLinkedList. It is a data structure which is described as follows : every element is connected with the one before it and after it. The previous element of the first one is the last element and the next element of the last one is the first element.
    Author:
    Teodor Shaterov
